thread.title: DHS Secretary: Abrupt Immigration Order Rollout ‘Is All On Me’
thread.title_full: DHS Secretary: Abrupt Immigration Order Rollout ‘Is All On Me’

author: Alicia Powe
title: DHS Secretary: Abrupt Immigration Order Rollout ‘Is All On Me’
text:
Democrat Labels Trump A ‘Dictator’ For Wanting Cabinet Nominees Confirmed 
“At the very many airports where people were coming into the United States, everyone was treated humanely,” he said. “I’ve read the reports about people standing up for hours on end—didn’t happen. That people were insulted, I guess insulted is in the eyes of the beholder but I tell you the type of men and women that I serve with do not insult people. They are very matter of fact—they are very business-like.” 
Kelly also voiced his support with Trump’s plan to build a wall along the U.S.-Mexico border, which will likely be completed in about two years. 
Trump “hired me to get control of the southwest border, which I will do,” Kelly said. 
A federal district court in Washington has blocked the order from going into effect nationwide while it works its way through the courts. Several other district courts blocked aspects of it in their jurisdiction. 
Three federal judges will hear oral arguments in the challenge to the president’s executive order on Tuesday in California. What do you think? Scroll down to comment below. Advertisement Popular Right Now
